first_translate: it’s lord arendt clovis...!

hangle: 하필이면 이 녀석을 또 맞닥뜨리게 될 줄이야!
first_translate: I can’t believe I ran into him again!
celine?
you look angry...

hangle: 나 어디로 끌려가서 심문받는 거 아냐?!
first_translate: did you get dragged away for questioning or something?!

hangle: 이렇게 되면 내가 먼저 아렌트를 제거해야…
first_translate: at this rate, we’ll have no choice but to eliminate arendt first--
well then...

hangle: 이전의 제 제안은 잊어버리시는 게 좋겠네요.
first_translate: I suppose my previous offer is off the table now.

hangle: 어떤 것이든 헤일론 가주 자리보다 나은 게 떠오르지는 않는지라.
first_translate: nothing seems more appealing than becoming head of house haylon at the moment.
huh? he gave up pretty easily.

hangle: 좀 더 날 캐 볼 줄 알았는데.
first_translate: I thought he’d try harder to persuade me.

hangle: 원작과 달리 내게 헤일론 가문이란 뒷배가 있는 터라,
first_translate: unlike what happened in the novel, I’m backed by house haylon right now,
so maybe that’s why he doesn’t want to push his luck too far.
that works out well for me anyway.
but still,
aren’t you worried about duke ernest’s proposal?
no matter how much I worry, there's nothing I can do about it.
how brave of you.
haha

hangle: 사실 특기 분야라 걱정을 안 하는 것 뿐이지만.
first_translate: to tell you the truth, I just don’t see any reason to fret over such things because they’re not really important to me.
right...

hangle: 떠나기 전, 한 가지 궁금한 점이 있습니다.
first_translate: before I go, may I ask one thing?

hangle: 그린 가의 치부를 고하는 익명의 문서.
first_translate: the anonymous document exposing the crimes committed by house green.
was that sent by lady olivia herself?

hangle: 그러고 보니 아렌트가 그 사건을 처리했다고 했지.
first_translate: now that you mention it, aren’t you the one who took care of that incident?
no wonder everything was resolved so quickly.
yes.
and thanks to your help, it turned out very helpful.
but...
since I contributed to bringing down her family,
I couldn’t help but wonder if she resented me for doing so.

hangle: 내가 가명을 댄 이유가 그것 때문이라고 생각했나?
first_translate: is that why you think I used a pseudonym?
not at all.
good.
I wouldn’t like to make enemies with house haylon.
then...
I wish you good fortune on your endeavors.
thank you.
what a relief! looks like I won’t need to assassinate anyone after all.
let’s return home now.
eek!!
your grace?
I could’ve sworn you left already.
of course not. my daughter is here.
you were scheming earlier, weren’t you?

hangle: 어니스트 공작이 그런 제안을 하도록 의도했잖냐.
first_translate: you deliberately made duke ernest propose that deal to me.
looks like you caught on.
it seemed like the easiest way to handle the situation.

hangle: 그대로 내버려 두었으면 황제 폐하를 닦달해서 귀찮게 굴었을걸요.
first_translate: if I had done nothing, he would've nagged his majesty until he got what he wanted.
and once my influence within high society dwindles,
my activities will become restricted as well.
nice work.

hangle: 확실히 내가 사람 보는 눈 하나는 있다니까.
first_translate: this proves that I'm great at reading people.
alright, then...
try calling me “father.”
can’t believe you haven’t given up yet!
no.
or "dad" is fine too.
I said no.
when do you plan on saying it, then?

hangle: 딱히 부를 일 없을 것 같은데요…?
first_translate: I doubt I'll ever call you either of those names...
fine...
hm?
huh?!
let’s go back home.

hangle: 대체 왜 이 타이밍에서 기가 죽어버리는 거야?!
first_translate: why did you suddenly give up?!
okay.

hangle: 언제 한 번 아빠라고 불러줘야 하나?!
first_translate: when am I going to hear you say “daddy”?! huh?!
a few days later
I guess...
...I still can’t quite believe it myself.

hangle: 내가 정말 리비아의 티 파티에 와 있다니.
first_translate: livy invited me to her tea party.

hangle: 만나 뵙게 되어 영광이에요, 피오나 영애!
first_translate: it’s nice meeting you, lady fiona!
likewise.

hangle: 조만간 가문에서 작은 티 파티를 열 예정인데,
first_translate: we’re planning to hold a small tea party soon,
may I invite you to join us?
I heard them say that before,
but I didn’t expect them to actually send me an invitation.
enjoy yourself while you’re here.
thanks...

hangle: 리비아는 이유 없이 잘해주는 사람이 아닌데…
first_translate: livy isn’t someone who treats others kindly without a reason...
I wonder what she has planned...
by the way,
I heard you entered some sort of bet with duke ernest.
really? lady fiona?
what kind of bet?
well, it wasn’t exactly a bet per se...
rather, let’s just say we came to a little agreement.
apparently, if I win the upcoming hunting competition,

hangle: 어니스트 공작님께서 절 헤일론의 후계자라고 인정하시겠대요.
first_translate: duke ernest promised to acknowledge me as successor of house haylon.
win the competition...?
isn’t that dangerous?
we’ll cheer you on, lady fiona.
doing whatever it takes to gain recognition from your own family is truly admirable!
thanks.
oh, lady fiona.
I have a question!
I heard there lives a terrifying magician in haylon.
pardon?
I heard that rumor too!

hangle: 웃으면서 마물을 도륙해서 주변이 온통 피바다가 된다고…
first_translate: they say he slaughters demonic beasts with a smile on his face and turns the ground red with their blood...
where did these rumors come from?
the story I heard was different though.
there’s a magician protecting haylon, which remains winter year-round.

hangle: 헤일론의 사람들은 그 마법사를 이렇게 칭송한다고 하더군요.
first_translate: from what I know, the people of haylon praise him greatly.
in fact,
he’s known as the guardian of winter.
